ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
libuuid:
- '2'
libx86emu:
- '3.7'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.description:
hwinfo/libhd are used to probe for the hardware present in the system. It
can be used to generate a system overview log which can be later used for
support.

This project provides a hardware probing library libhd.so and a command
line tool hwinfo using it. A major project using this library is YaST, the
SUSE installation tool.
about.summary: hwinfo/libhd are used to probe for the hardware present in the system

about.description:
hwinfo/libhd are used to probe for the hardware present in the system. It
can be used to generate a system overview log which can be later used for
support.

This project provides a hardware probing library libhd.so and a command
line tool hwinfo using it. A major project using this library is YaST, the
SUSE installation tool.
about.summary: hwinfo/libhd are used to probe for the hardware present in the system

name: hwinfo
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "25.1" %}

package:
  name: hwinfo
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/openSUSE/hwinfo/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3a424a3facf8632a9171a2c40a65f7bf57690ea189cc0d0a1e5bb86f35082192
  patches:
    - use_flex_instead_of_lex.patch

build:
  skip: true  # [not linux]
  number: 0
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('hwinfo', max_pin='x.x') }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}
    - make
    - flex
  host:
    - libx86emu
    - libuuid

test:
  commands:
    - hwinfo
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libhd.so
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/hd.h

about:
  home: https://github.com/openSUSE/hwinfo
  summary: hwinfo/libhd are used to probe for the hardware present in the system
  description: |
    hwinfo/libhd are used to probe for the hardware present in the system. It
    can be used to generate a system overview log which can be later used for
    support.

    This project provides a hardware probing library libhd.so and a command
    line tool hwinfo using it. A major project using this library is YaST, the
    SUSE installation tool.

  license: GPL-2.0-only
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hmaarrfk
